title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Skills: System Model for Cognitive Load Management and Working Memory Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain types of cognitive load (intrinsic/extrinsic/germane) using system model-based design
Learners can propose three or more strategies to manage active working memory (active WM) and distracted working memory (distracted WM) in mobile learning environments
Learners can diagnose their cognitive load patterns and develop improvement plans by analyzing formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
